186a6d82-bcd1-4143-96af-c6d145acaaf6.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

616cb792-12e5-4754-96a1-c695dfaa15a8.name: 邪恶双生子
616cb792-12e5-4754-96a1-c695dfaa15a8.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

edb12847-a430-4889-846f-02679dcc412b.name: 邪恶双生子
edb12847-a430-4889-846f-02679dcc412b.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

414ed8b4-d6ba-4974-9fdd-ca5f329d68e8.name: 健康
414ed8b4-d6ba-4974-9fdd-ca5f329d68e8.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

130f0625-a6c9-41f5-8c99-07318aaf2ca2.name: 战斗反射
130f0625-a6c9-41f5-8c99-07318aaf2ca2.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

06670a63-caf4-40fe-8ed9-289669ac6c68.name: 易于命中
06670a63-caf4-40fe-8ed9-289669ac6c68.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

4d2aeb29-17b7-4ad4-af43-69ff3c49e7ec.name: 标志性装备
4d2aeb29-17b7-4ad4-af43-69ff3c49e7ec.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

7aad95ec-251a-4daa-bc9f-231790de1452.name: Fit, Very
7aad95ec-251a-4daa-bc9f-231790de1452.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)
